content.text: Watching us day after day? Try looking in the mirror first.
You look so often, yet still can't see a shred of promise.
You lot calling yourselves awakened are really something.
Each of you performs lucidity, but you're more lost than anyone. You say you've seen through everything, while still clouded over yourselves.
I'm not from your brood. I'm just here to watch.
Watching you race to fall into the pit, smiling like it's real.
You really think you're some kind of awakened one?
That little 'philosophy' is, at best, an excuse for inferiority. Talk reason, talk self-analysis, then turn around and spin in place again.
Every time someone falls into the same pit, they still pretend they're exploring the abyss.

The abyss?

That's just the wound you keep licking.

You can't even let go of the pain, afraid that without it you won't be special. Afraid that if you ever truly get better, no one will look at you.
Call yourselves awake, applaud each other. The stage is yours.
I just lift the curtain and watch the joke.
